title: Stuck on authenticating
body: I was in the middle of a ranked game, and all of a sudden my ping spiked up and I disconnected. I managed to relog but I was disconnected once more. After that I tried restarting the client, with great difficulty (I'm using the new client). When I do manage to get to the loin screen it gets stuck on authenticating forever. This is very frustrating; I use ethernet and have never had this issue before. My wifi is fine, as I can access everything else without issue. My team is still managing to hold out in the ranked game bless them, however the game has been made needlessly more difficult due to this issue. Should they lose the game, it will be because of this issue.

replies.body: It seems like you have an unstable connection that's degrading an failing to reach either our game or authentication servers.  Even if you can access other things, it doesn't make you immune from connection to specific servers.  You should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Hopefully, everything ended up alright and for your team.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks for the reply, I never did find out how my connection ended up as unstable, but my friend from a different part of the campus also had the same issue while he was in an ARAM. I suppose it was just an issue with the campus' wifi which is tragic.
